tips.title: Optimal Irrigation Timing
tips.description: Water your crops early morning (5-7 AM) or late evening (6-8 PM) to minimize water loss through evaporation and ensure maximum absorption.

tips.title: Natural Pest Control
tips.description: Use neem oil spray and companion planting with marigolds to naturally deter pests without harmful chemicals, protecting both crops and beneficial insects.

tips.title: Soil Health Monitoring
tips.description: Test your soil pH every 6 months and add organic compost regularly to maintain optimal nutrient levels and improve soil structure.

tips.title: Harvest Timing
tips.description: Monitor crop maturity indicators daily and harvest during cool morning hours to maintain quality and extend storage life of your produce.
